anetaFacts.context: I have many interests such as drawing, needle felting, wood working...
Recently my interests are focusing on wood working!
I am shy but I will joke with you a lot once I get to know you.
I am from Poland but currently I live in Dublin, Ireland. My husband is from America and now we live here together.
My favourite dish changes with time, but currently sushi is my obsession.
In the future I am planning to try jewellery making using silver clay, and pottery in the far future.
